quote: Before software can be reusable it first has to be usable

quote: There are two major products that come out of Berkeley: LSD and UNIX. We dont't believe this to be a coincidence
author: Jeremy S. Anderson

quote: Nine people can't make a baby in a month
author: Fred Brooks

quote: Measuring programming progress by lines of code is like measuring aircraft building progress by weight

quote: If debugging is the process of removing software bugs, then programming must be the process of putting them in
author: Edsger Dijkstra

quote: The gap between theory and practice is not as wide in theory as it is in practice
author: Unknown

quote: There are two ways of constructing a software design: One way is to make it so simple that there are obviously no deficiencies, and the other way is to make it so compilcated that there are obvious deficiencies. The first method is far moredifficult
author: C.A.R. Hoare

quote: A computer lets you make more mistakes faster than any other invention in human history, with the exceptions of handgunsand tequila
author: Mitch Ratcliffe

quote: In order to understand recursion, one must first understand recursion
author: Unknown

quote: Give a man a program, frustrate him for a day. Teach a man to program, frustrate him for a lifetime
author: Waseem Latif

quote: Life would be much easier if I had the source code
author: Unknown

quote: Walking on water and developing software from a specification are easy if both are frozen
author: Edward V Berard

quote: You miss 100 percent of the shots you never take
author: Wayne Gretzky

quote: The key to performance is elegance, not battalions of special cases
author: Jon Bentley, Doug McIlroy

quote: Inside every large program, there is a program trying to get out
author: C.A.R. Hoare

quote: A good way to stay flexible is to write less code
author: Pragmatic Programmer

quote: Adding manpower to a late software project makes it later!
author: Fred Brooks

quote: A person who never made a mistake never tried anything new
author: Albert Einstein

quote: If you can't write it down in English, you can't code it
author: Peter Halpen

quote: Talk is cheap, show me the code!
author: Linus Torvalds

quote: You are what you share
author: Charles Leadbeater

quote: Don't make the user provide information that the system already knows
author: Rick Lemons

quote: If the programmers like each other, they play a game called 'pair programming'. And if not then the game is called 'peer review'
author: Anna Nachesa

quote: Focus on WHY instead of WHAT in your code will make you a better developer
author: Jordi Boggiano

quote: If you can't deploy your services independently then they aren't microservices
author: Daniel Bryant

quote: No one hates software more than software developers
author: Jeff Atwood

quote: Fix the cause, not the symptom
author: Steve Maguire

quote: Design is choosing how you will fail
author: Ron Fein

quote: Code never lies, comments sometimes do
author: Ron Jeffries

quote: It's not more features now vs cleanup now. It's features now vs features later. Don't act shoked when it's later and you chose "fewer"
author: Ken Beck

quote: It's a poor craftsman that blames his tools, an expert craftsman knows how to choose excellent tools
author: Greg Kroah-Hartman

quote: Never have a meeting where two pizzas couldn't feed the entire group
author: Jeff Bezos

quote: I am not in competition with anyone but myself. My goal is to improve myself continuously
author: Bill Gates

quote: The biggest risk is not taking any risk
author: Mark Zuckerberg

quote: The only way you're going to be successful is if you admit what you don't know and you ask for help
author: Randi Zuckerberg

quote: Great things in business are never done by one person, they're done by a team of people
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Do not try to do everything. Do one thing well
author: Steve Jobs

quote: If you define the problem correctly, you almost have the solution
author: Steve Jobs

quote: It takes a lot of hard work to make something simple
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Life is about creating and living experiences that are worth sharing
author: Steve Jobs

quote: If you’re not doing some things that are crazy, then you’re doing the wrong things
author: Larry Page

quote: Always deliver more than expected
author: Larry Page

quote: It's very hard to fail completely, if you aim high enough
author: Larry Page

quote: Never trust a computer you can't throw out a window
author: Steve Wozniak

quote: The easier it is to do something, the harder it is to change the way you do it
author: Steve Wozniak

quote: Creative things have to sell to get acknowledged as such
author: Steve Wozniak

quote: People who take risks are the people you'll lose against
author: John Sculley

quote: As a brand marketer, I'm a big believer in 'branding the customer experience', not just selling the service
author: John Sculley

quote: We change our tools and then our tools change us
author: Jeff Bezos

quote: Obsess about customers, not competitors
author: Jeff Bezos

quote: When you struggle with a problem, that's when you understand it
author: Elon Musk

quote: Constantly seek criticism. A well thought out critique of what you're doing is as valuable as gold
author: Elon Musk

quote: If what we are doing is not seen by some people as science fiction, it's probably not transformative enough
author: Sergey Brin

quote: Solving big problems is easier than solving little problems
author: Sergey Brin

quote: Do not be afraid to fail, but also, do not be afraid to succeed
author: Eric Schmidt

quote: We run the company by questions, not by answers
author: Eric Schmidt
